page.title: 10VILLAGE LIFE BY A LOCAL
page.content: VILLAGE LIFE BY A LOCAL Mr John Keeley, now retired, has lived in Wigmore village all his life. He helps the community by operating a hospital car service and had this to say about the changes that have taken place in his lifetime. "I have lived in this village all my life (over sixty years). The main difference in the village is that younger people have moved to the neighbourhood. There is a very big increase in transport and also in the number of new houses but a decrease in facilities as there were four shops but now there is only one village store. This has recently changed ownership. There are more small businesses in the village."
